SEARCH
Package com.root14.barcodeservice.core

Class BarcodeGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.root14.barcodeservice.core.BarcodeGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Generator
public class BarcodeGenerator extends Object implements Generator
A utility class responsible for generating barcode images using the Google ZXing library. This class implements the Generator interface and provides various overloaded methods to generate barcode images with different configurations, including custom image configurations and encoding hints.

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public BufferedImage generate(String data, int width, int height) throws com.google.zxing.WriterException
      Generates a barcode image with the specified data, width, and height. This method delegates to the generateQr(String, int, int) method.
      Specified by:
      generate in interface Generator
      Parameters:
      data - The data to encode in the barcode.
      width - The desired width of the barcode image.
      height - The desired height of the barcode image.
      Returns:
      A BufferedImage representing the generated barcode.
      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.WriterException - If an error occurs during barcode encoding.

    • generateQr

      public BufferedImage generateQr(String data, int width, int height, Map<com.google.zxing.EncodeHintType,Object> hints) throws com.google.zxing.WriterException
      Generates a barcode image with the specified data, width, height, and encoding hints.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to encode in the barcode.
      width - The desired width of the barcode image.
      height - The desired height of the barcode image.
      hints - A Map of EncodeHintType to Object providing encoding hints.
      Returns:
      A BufferedImage representing the generated barcode.
      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.WriterException - If an error occurs during barcode encoding.

    • generateQr

      public BufferedImage generateQr(String data, int width, int height, com.google.zxing.client.j2se.MatrixToImageConfig config) throws com.google.zxing.WriterException
      Generates a barcode image with the specified data, width, height, and image configuration.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to encode in the barcode.
      width - The desired width of the barcode image.
      height - The desired height of the barcode image.
      config - A MatrixToImageConfig object to customize image rendering.
      Returns:
      A BufferedImage representing the generated barcode.
      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.WriterException - If an error occurs during barcode encoding.

    • generateQr

      public BufferedImage generateQr(String data, int width, int height) throws com.google.zxing.WriterException
      Generates a barcode image with the specified data, width, and height using default configurations.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to encode in the barcode.
      width - The desired width of the barcode image.
      height - The desired height of the barcode image.
      Returns:
      A BufferedImage representing the generated barcode.
      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.WriterException - If an error occurs during barcode encoding.

    • generateQr

      public BufferedImage generateQr(String data, int width, int height, com.google.zxing.client.j2se.MatrixToImageConfig config, Map<com.google.zxing.EncodeHintType,Object> hints) throws com.google.zxing.WriterException
      Generates a barcode image with the specified data, dimensions, image configuration, and encoding hints. This is the most comprehensive `generateQr` method.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to encode in the barcode.
      width - The desired width of the barcode image.
      height - The desired height of the barcode image.
      config - An optional MatrixToImageConfig object to customize image rendering (can be null for default).
      hints - An optional Map of EncodeHintType to Object providing encoding hints (can be null for default).
      Returns:
      A BufferedImage representing the generated barcode.
      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.WriterException - If an error occurs during barcode encoding.
